hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash echo "giteePullRequestIid: ${giteePullRequestIid}" echo "giteeAfterCommitSha: ${giteeAfterCommitSha}" echo "giteeRef: ${giteeRef}"
#git config --global user.name "opengauss-bot" #git config --global credential.helper "store" rm -rf openGauss openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Ur="git@gitee.com:opengauss/openGauss-server.git" a=0 flag=0 while [ $a -lt 10 ] do echo $a rm -rf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss timeout 60 git clone "${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" if [[ $? == 0 ]] ; then flag=1 break fi a=`expr $a + 1` done
if [[ $flag == 0 ]] ; then echo "clone clone failed!" exit 1 fi
#if [ -d "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" ] #then # cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss && git clean -dfx && git checkout -f master && git reset --hard origin/master #else # git clone "${openGaussServer_Ssh_Repo_Url}" "${WORKSPACE}/openGauss" #fi
# for memcheck #cd ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss #mkdir -p Tools/memory_check #cp -fr /home/PrivateBuild_tools/memleak_ignore ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/Tools/memory_check/.
#sed -i -e 's/leak -fno-omit-frame-pointer/leak -fno-omit-frame-pointer -fsanitize-recover=address/g' ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss/src/Makefile.global.in
cd ${WORKSPACE} rm -rf openGauss-third_party_binarylibs*
set +x wget -q -P ${WORKSPACE} ftp://mpp:mpp@192.168.0.155/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -O ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz set -x tar -zxf ${WORKSPACE}/openGauss-third_party_binarylibs.tar.gz -C ${WORKSPACE}
chmod -R 755 /usr1 chmod -R 755 /home/PrivateBuild_tools sh /home/PrivateBuild_tools/Private_Main.sh 0
